titles.title: In The Wilderness For God (easy familiar tune)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In the wilderness for God Just a common bush a flame Thus may I be blessed Lord For the glory of Thy Name{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Just a common bush to be Something in which God can dwell Something thru which God can speak Something thru which God can tell{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All His yearning over men All His purposes of love Flaming with no light of earth But with glory from above{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}God Himself within the bush Nothing seen but just the flame Make me that just that O God For the glory of Thy Name{/lang-eng}
